question: A magazine wants to include contribution from its readers for an article called 'the book that influenced me most". Write a letter to the editor of the magazine about the book that influences you most. In your letter, describe what this book was about, explain how this book influenced you, say whether this book would be likely to influence other people
text: I am writing this with regards to the notice that I read in your magazine last week, requesting to send details of an inspirational book.
To begin with, let me explain  this book. This book is about, how to lead a successful life while being happy with what you have.

Before reading this wonderful writing, I was just an ordinary person who suffered a lot not having luxury items around me, and also I cried when others had those things. I pursue happiness with endless dreams, sleepless nights, and an overwhelming workload. Ultimately, I lead myself to reach the doctor's advice in order to control my feelings.

After I read this, I realized what  actual jubilation is, now I am a successful business that owns more than what I had a few years back. Moreover, now I have the eternal delight which I had not a few years ago. So, I recommend, everyone to read "Pursuit happiness" by Richerd Hackwins, and be happy with what you have.
If need more information please feel free to contact me on my mobile. I look forward to hearing from you.
